snippet.title: The Silent Age HD Teaser
snippet.description:
On May 29, 2015, visit http://store.steampowered.com/app/352520 to discover the truth behind our extinction. Can you, a simple janitor and literally, “the average Joe,” save humankind?

Release Date: May 29, 2015
Genre: Point-and-Click Adventure
Platform: Steam
Developer: House on Fire
Publisher: Meridian4

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/352520
Website: http://thesilentage.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SilentAgeGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/silentagegame
